Name: Calm Down, Stalin - VR
About the game: Best Stalin simulator on the Internet is now in VR! Sign important papers, answer phone calls, avoid foreign spies, and don't forget to smoke your pipe to relieve stress in this Stalin simulator! Base levels and tutorials to help you learn all the mechanics Unusual and absurd levels to just have fun or chill out and smoke your pipe Difficult challenge levels for the most competitive players
